site_name: St Olaves Nursing Home Lower RoadLondonSouthwarkSE16 2TL
description: Demolition of the existing buildings on site (a derelict single storey nursing home and porta-cabins) and construction of two buildings (Building A - Part 4/Part 5/Part 6 storey building fronting onto Lower Road, Building B - Part 3 /Part 4 storey building fronting on to Ann Moss Way) providing 62 residential units together with 2 wheelchair parking spaces and associated landscaping
